function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low adoption of technologies in hospitals","Impact":"Limited support for healthcare system in a pandemic situation","Mitigation":"Encourage and incentivize hospitals to adopt AI and ML technologies for broader use","Technologies":"AI and ML for prediction, diagnosis, and treatment","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions and government"},{"Description":"Reliance on traditional methods for disease surveillance","Impact":"Delayed detection and response to disease outbreak","Mitigation":"Implement AI-based surveillance systems for early detection and alerting of disease outbreaks","Technologies":"AI-based infection-surveillance systems","People":"Public health officials, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Public health agencies, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Limited usage of AI and ML for disease forecasting and classification","Impact":"Reduced ability to predict and classify disease outbreaks accurately","Mitigation":"Promote research and development of AI and ML applications for disease forecasting and classification","Technologies":"AI and ML for disease forecasting and classification","People":"Researchers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare institutions"}]}
